title: Keep Pets Warm Indoors
description: Ensure your pets stay cozy indoors during cold months. Keep their bedding warm and away from drafts or cold floors.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Avoid keeping pets outside for too long. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur quickly, especially for smaller or short-haired pets.

title: Use Pet-Friendly Paw Balm
description: Snow and salt can irritate pet paws. Apply a protective paw balm before walks and wipe their feet afterward to prevent cracking.

title: Proper Winter Clothing
description: Short-haired breeds benefit from sweaters or jackets. Ensure they fit well and keep the pet’s chest and back warm.

title: Keep Pets Hydrated
description: Pets can get dehydrated in winter too! Make sure they always have access to fresh, unfrozen water.

title: Regular Vet Checkups
description: Cold weather can worsen arthritis and joint pain. Schedule a winter checkup to keep your pet’s health in top condition.
